Text: Get a life....Isreal is the ONLY Civilized bunch in that part of the world.  And you prove it with your assinine remarks.rnrnTo the OP great post, look forward to reading it.

Second thought to the American and Jew hater bigot.rnrnThe only contribution to the world by Islam in the last 700 years that doesn\'t involve blowing something up or killing someone was the Burqa.rnrnWonderful thing to be proud of..a body length shopping bag your ugly wife and sister has to wear because you can\'t find a woman to be proud to be seen with.rnrnWonderful....thats what a 7th centurn mindset and a 3rd grade education gets you in the muslim world.

So thats the sort of brainwashing the idiots you call religous leaders make you believe.  rnrnOnly the weak minded follow a religon that all about oppression and relies on keeping their people as poorly educated and ignorant of reality as Islam does.rnrnThe Muslim world is controlled by a few \"Religous\" leaders that are nothing but a power hungry hipocrits.  rnrnWitness the \"enlightened\" Muslim faith that Stones women for refusing to wear burlap sacks.  Witness the Enlightened Muslim faith that treats livestock better than their women...mothers, sisters and daughters.

I'm guessing the initial comment was removed, and being a muslim, all I can think of saying "FUCK YOU" to that son of a bitch.  It pisses me off when uneducated bigots bastardize our religion for their own political shit.  Whatever he said and whatever your images on Islam may be, I guarantee you that they are misguided and untrue.  Once again... EAT SHIT AND DIE
